nodes.text: Star Wars: R2-D2 and Friends is a Star Wars Legends Level 2 DK Readers title focusing on R2-D2, C-3PO, and other droids from the Star Wars galaxy. It was written by Simon Beecroft and was published by DK Publishing on December 1, 2008.
The book was reissued with new cover art as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: R2-D2 Level 2 box set on December 12, 2017.
Learn all about R2-D2, C-3PO, and other droids large and small in this classic Star Wars reader, which features longer sentences, increased vocabulary, information boxes, and a simple index.
